verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.

tokens.t: . Praise, O ye servants of the

verses.plain: Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore.

tokens.t: Blessed be the name of the
from this time forth and for evermore.

verses.plain: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD’s name is to be praised.

tokens.t: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the

verses.plain: The LORD is high above all nations, and his glory above the heavens.
Who is like unto the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high,

tokens.t: our God, who dwelleth on high,

verses.plain: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth!

tokens.t: in heaven, and in the earth!

verses.plain: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;

tokens.t: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust,
lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;

verses.plain: That he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.

tokens.t: with the princes of his people.

verses.plain: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.

tokens.t: He maketh the barren woman to keep house,
a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the

footnotes.text: dwelleth…: Heb. exalteth himself to dwell
to keep…: Heb. to dwell in an house
